text:
Created attachment 24290
Ability to cleanup assertionResults and subResults

Hello,
Following your change on issue:
https://issues.apache.org/bugzilla/show_bug.cgi?id=47394

It would be helpful if you could add some kind of cleanup methods to
SampleResult class.
Use case would be for example remote load testing where we only want to
communicate useful infos.

See attached patch.

Thanks in advance
Philippe
http://www.ubik-ingenierie.com
creator: p.mouawad@ubik-ingenierie.com
